    About

    I am a Microsoft MVP, a Xamarin Certified Mobile Developer for iOS and Android, and the leader of the Tech Valley .NET User Group.

    I have been developing on various platforms for way too long to detail, but I currently work and write about C# programming using Microsoft and Xamarin/.NET MAUI tools. I work for Tyler Technologies, in the school transportation market. We are always hiring, drop me a note if you have any questions. Twitter works best for that sort of thing.

    If you have a Pluralsight account, I have authored the following courses:

    • Using the Xamarin.Forms Shell
    • Working with Native Features in Xamarin.Forms Applications
    • Xamarin.Forms: Localization
    • Xamarin.Forms 5 Fundamentals (Coming soon)

    I’m the author of the book “Cross-platform Localization for Native Mobile Apps with Xamarin” and you can find it at Apress Books or on Amazon.
